original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: ▁dvīhi ▁bhikkhave ▁dhammehi ▁samannāgato ▁bhikkhu ▁diṭṭh eva ▁dhamme ▁sukhaṃ ▁viharati ▁avi ghāt aṃ ▁anu pāyās aṃ ▁ apariḷāh aṃ

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
Indriyesu guttadvāratāya ca, bhojane mattaññutāya ca.
analyzed: ▁indriy esu ▁ gutt advāra tāya ▁ca ▁bhojan e ▁ matt aññu tāya ▁ca

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: ▁imehi ▁kho ▁bhikkhave ▁dvīhi ▁dhammehi ▁samannāgato ▁bhikkhu ▁diṭṭh eva ▁dhamme ▁sukhaṃ ▁viharati ▁avi ghāt aṃ ▁anu pāyās aṃ ▁ apariḷāh aṃ

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
